name: Striped tote (berry)
description:
Hand woven wool tote with distressed leather straps.

Although I love colour, nothing beats the natural shades of fiber straight from the sheep. I combined natural sand coloured wool with yarn which I dyed in a soft berry shade to create narrow horizontal stripes across this handwoven wool cloth. 

I cut the straps for this bag from buttery soft, honey coloured distressed leather. They are cut nice and wide and stitched to the bag on both sides from base to top.
 
The bag is lined in cocoa coloured linen, with a double interior pocket sized perfectly for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away.  An antique brass coloured magnetic snap fastens the bag. 


Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 10"
Width at base: 11.5"
Bag height: approx 11"
Strap length: approx 11.5" from top of bag to top of shoulder

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Crossbody satchel (berry)
description:
Hand woven wool satchel with dark brown leather base and strap.

This bag is the softest, warmest shade of what I can only describe as berry. I created a striped 100% wool cloth, which was dyed both before and after weaving to give subtle yet definite horizontal stripes across the cloth. 

All the leather components on this bag are cut by hand from buttery soft, molasses coloured leather.

An antique brass coloured hoop suspended on a leather strap drapes over the top of the bag and down its front, keeping the bag closed and looking pretty lovely in the process.

The satchel is lined in cocoa coloured linen, with a double interior pocket sized perfectly for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables hidden away.  
 
As with all my bags I cut the strap by hand, and made it fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings. 

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 8"
Width at base: 10"
Bag height: approx 9"
Strap length: approx 48" when fully lengthened

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Houndstooth tote (buff)
description:
Hand woven wool tote with distressed leather straps.

Although I love colour, nothing beats the natural shades of fiber straight from the sheep. I also happen to love the smell of fresh wool, but I may be alone there... 

I wove the cloth for this bag by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool in cream and sand tones, to create a subtle houndstooth check. 

I cut the leather straps for this bag nice and wide from soft, distressed, honey coloured leather and stitched them to the bag on both sides from base to top.
 
Because I always need a little colour somewhere, the bag is lined in rust coloured linen, with a leather interior pocket sized perfectly for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away.  An antique brass coloured magnetic snap fastens the bag. 


Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 11"
Width at base: 11.5"
Bag height: approx 11"
Strap length: approx 11.5" from top of bag to top of shoulder

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Wristlet (rust)
description:
Hand woven wool wristlet with chestnut brown leather base and strap.

It took several dips in the dye bath to get this colour just right, and I could not love it more. I wove the cloth from a combination of Icelandic fleece from our local farm which I spun by hand, and a sturdy 100% wool which were all dyed both before and after weaving to achieve a rich, rusty red tone.  

As for all my bags, I hand cut the strap, and attached it to the purse with an antique brass coloured ring snap. The purse has an antique brass coloured zipper with leather pull, and is lined with mustard yellow linen.

Measurements:

Width: approx 7"
Height: approx 5"
Strap: wrist loop approx 10.5" circumference

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Three-in-one convertible (berry)
description:
Hand woven wool purse with distressed leather base and straps.

This bag is three bags in one! With its long narrow straps attached, it is a crossbody bag large enough to comfortably hold your phone, cards, keys, lipstick and any other essentials. Unhook the strap and you have a roomy wristlet, or leave all the straps at home and you have the perfect clutch purse. Come to think of it, you could also leave off the wristlet strap, and attach only the long strap for a comfy shoulder bag. Perhaps I should call this bag a four-in-one!

This bag is considerably larger than my wristlet purses (see exact measurements below). 

This bag is the softest, warmest shade of what I can only describe as berry. I created a striped 100% wool cloth, which was dyed both before and after weaving to give subtle yet definite horizontal stripes across the cloth.
 
I hand cut the straps from buttery soft honey coloured leather, and double stitched them for extra strength. They attach to the purse with antique brass coloured ring snaps which are slim and sleek but super strong. The purse has an antique brass coloured zipper with leather pull, and is lined with cocoa coloured linen.

Measurements:

Width: approx 9"
Height: approx 6"
Strap: wrist loop approx 13" circumference
Strap: approx 48" when fully extended and attached to wristlet

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Convertible crossbody (purple)
description:
Hand woven wool handbag with antique brass coloured chain strap, removable leather strap, and leather base and sides.

I have wanted to make this bag for a really long time. Sketch after sketch, I finally figured out how to make it work. 

I wove the cloth by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool which I hand dyed in two shades of purple, then dyed the cloth again after weaving to create a deep and shadowy purple cloth which looks almost like velvet. 

All leather components on this bag are hand cut from buttery soft molasses coloured leather. The crossbody strap fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings and attaches to the bag with two antique brass coloured trigger snaps. 

This bag also has an antique brass coloured chain, which drapes across the front of the bag when the cross body strap is being used. When the cross body strap is removed, the chain becomes the bag's strap, allowing the bag to be worn on the shoulder. If desired, the chain can be removed by using a small screwdriver to loosen the large d-rings which secure the chain to the bag. Trust me, it's easy to do.

I lined the bag with plum coloured linen, with a leather interior pocket perfectly sized for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away. An antique brass coloured magnetic snap keeps the top of the bag securely closed.

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 10"
Width at widest point: approx 14"
Bag height: approx 10.5"
Length of cross body strap: approx 48" when fully extended, including trigger snaps
Length of chain strap: 18"

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of handmade products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Convertible crossbody (emerald)
description:
Hand woven wool handbag with antique brass coloured chain strap, removable leather strap, and leather base and sides.

I have wanted to make this bag for a really long time. Sketch after sketch, I finally figured out how to make it work. 

I wove the cloth by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool which I hand dyed in vibrant shades of emerald and teal, and Icelandic fleece which I spun by hand and dyed deep forest green. Together, they make a rich emerald cloth with gorgeous depth and texture.  

As with all my bags, I hand cut the strap, and made it fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings. The strap is attached to the bag with two antique brass coloured trigger snaps. 

This bag also has an antique brass coloured chain, which drapes across the front of the bag when the cross body strap is being used. When the cross body strap is removed, the chain becomes the bag's strap, allowing the bag to be worn on the shoulder. If desired, the chain can be removed by using a small screwdriver to loosen the large d-rings which secure the chain to the bag. Trust me, it's easy to do.

I lined the bag with cocoa coloured linen, with a leather interior pocket perfectly sized for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away. An antique brass coloured magnetic snap keeps the top of the bag securely closed.

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 10"
Width at widest point: approx 14"
Bag height: approx 10.5"
Length of cross body strap: approx 48" when fully extended, including trigger snaps
Length of chain strap: 18"

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of handmade products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Foldover satchel (emerald)
description:
Hand woven wool and leather foldover satchel with zippered closure.

I wove the cloth for this bag by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool which I hand dyed in vibrant shades of emerald and teal, and Icelandic fleece which I spun by hand and dyed deep forest green. Together, they make a rich emerald cloth with gorgeous depth and texture.  

The reverse side of this bag, and its front flap when folded down, is cut from buttery soft molasses coloured leather. An antique brass coloured magnetic snap keeps the flap in place when folded down. 

The leather strap is cut by hand and double stitched, and is fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings.

A heavy gauge antique brass zipper closes the bag, and is adorned with a hand cut leather tassel.

The satchel is lined in mustard yellow linen, with a leather interior pocket sized perfectly for your phone.  
 
Bag measurements:

Width at opening: 10"
Width at base: 10"
Bag height: approx 8" when flap is folded down, 14" when opened out.
Strap length: approx 48" when fully lengthened

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Wrap Around shoulder bag (orange)
description:
Hand woven wool handbag with antique brass coloured hardware and distressed leather straps, base and sides.

To me, this bag screams Autumn. I wove the cloth by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using Icelandic fleece from our local farm which I spun by hand, and a sturdy 100% wool which I hand dyed in vibrant, delicious orange. 

A hand cut strap wraps right around this bag and fastens centre-front with a magnetic snap. The buckle can also be opened and hooked onto the strap for added security, if you need it. 

I lined the bag with mustard yellow linen, with a double interior pocket perfectly sized for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away. An antique brass coloured magnetic snap keeps the top of the bag securely closed.

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 10"
Width at widest point: approx 14"
Bag height: approx 10.5"
Length of strap: 21" from top edge of bag on one side, to the other.

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of handmade products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Convertible crossbody (chartreuse)
description:
Hand woven wool handbag with antique brass coloured chain strap, removable leather strap, and leather base and sides.

I have wanted to make this bag for a really long time. Sketch after sketch, I finally figured out how to make it work. 

I wove the cloth by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool which I hand dyed in vibrant chartreuse, and a merino wool and silk blend dyed in subtle shades of goldenrod yellow and rust.  

As with all my bags, I hand cut the strap, and made it fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings. The strap is attached to the bag with two antique brass coloured trigger snaps. 

This bag also has an antique brass coloured chain, which drapes across the front of the bag when the cross body strap is being used. When the cross body strap is removed, the chain becomes the bag's strap, allowing the bag to be worn on the shoulder. If desired, the chain can be removed by using a small screwdriver to loosen the large d-rings which secure the chain to the bag. Trust me, it's easy to do.

I lined the bag with mustard yellow linen, with a leather interior pocket perfectly sized for your phone, and a zippered pocket to keep your valuables tucked away. An antique brass coloured magnetic snap keeps the top of the bag securely closed.

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 10"
Width at widest point: approx 14"
Bag height: approx 10.5"
Length of cross body strap: approx 48" when fully extended, including trigger snaps
Length of chain strap: 18"

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of handmade products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

description:
Hand woven wool wristlet with distressed leather base and strap.

Although I love colour, nothing beats the natural shades of fiber straight from the sheep. I wove the cloth for this bag by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool in cream and sand tones, combined with Icelandic fleece from our local farm which I spun by hand. The natural colours combine to create subtle stripes which run horizontally on one side of the wristlet, and vertically on the other.  

As for all my bags, I hand cut the strap, and attached it to the purse with an antique brass coloured ring snap. The purse has an antique brass coloured zipper with leather pull, and is lined with mustard yellow linen.

Measurements:

Width: approx 7"
Height: approx 5"
Strap: wrist loop approx 10.5" circumference

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Wristlet (plum)
description:
Hand woven wool wristlet with distressed leather base and strap.

I wove the cloth for this purse by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool in deep purple and magenta, resulting in a rich, plum coloured fabric. I have been a sucker for purple since I was a kid, and this cloth really makes me smile.

As with all my bags, I cut the leather strap by hand and attached it to the purse with an antique brass coloured ring snap. The purse has an antique brass coloured zipper, with leather pull.

The purse is lined with dark purple linen.

Measurements:

Width: approx 7"
Height: approx 5"
Strap: wrist loop approx 10.5" circumference

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Wristlet (sunset)
description:
Hand woven wool wristlet with tan leather base and strap.

Sometimes, two wrongs do make a right. This bag was made from hand spun wool in two shades I really didn't like. But somehow when spun together, the colours magically combined to make a yarn in shades of magenta, rust and yellow, just like a sunset. I combined this yarn with a pumpkin coloured merino and silk blend, and wove the cloth on my Ashford rigid heddle loom.

The base and strap for this wristlet are made from soft honey coloured leather, with a slightly pebbly texture. As for all my bags, I hand cut the strap, and attached it to the purse with an antique brass coloured ring snap. The purse has an antique brass coloured zipper with leather pull, and is lined with mustard yellow linen.

Measurements:

Width: approx 7" 
Height: approx 5" 
Strap: wrist loop approx 10.5" circumference

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.

name: Crossbody satchel (plum)
description:
Hand woven wool satchel with honey colored leather base and strap.

When I was a kid, purple was my absolute favourite colour. I guess I still have a soft spot for it. I wove the cloth for this bag by hand on my Ashford rigid heddle loom using 100% wool in deep purple and magenta, resulting in a rich, plum coloured fabric. It makes me smile.

The kid in me knows you can never have enough purple, so I lined the bag in deep purple linen, with a double interior pocket sized perfectly for you phone and valuables, and a magnetic snap to keep the bag securely closed. 

As with all my bags I cut the strap by hand, and made it fully adjustable with two antique brass coloured d-rings. 

An antique brass coloured hoop suspended on a leather strap drapes over the top of the bag and down its front, helping to keep the bag closed when the magnetic snap is not in use. 

Bag measurements:

Width at opening: approx 8"
Width at base: 10"
Bag height: approx 9.5"
Strap length: approx 40" when fully lengthened

Please note that this bag is hand crafted from natural materials. Slight imperfections are an inherent part of hand made products, and add to their character and uniqueness. As this bag is made of wool, treat it with care and remove any pills or loose fibers gently.
